name: Polish Special Forces
description:
In this universe Poland has been invaded by the crusader knights (again)! Have no fear the polish special forces are here! Pick your hero - one of the gratest Poles that ever lived and cleanse the Zamek of Ksiazat Mazowieckich from the crusader again.

WSAD - movement

Arrow keys - shooting direction

Game made specificly through the event - gamejam from PolskiGamedev.pl

solo dev entry - Art & Design & Programming by Piotr Kostrzewa aka "Festuka" aka "Szejdi"
